data.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
data.author: Aristotle

data.quote: As long as you think your past is bad you must be improving
data.author: Louis C.K

data.quote: Just because you took longer than others, doesn’t mean you failed.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: If you hear a voice within you say 'you cannot paint', then by all means paint and that voice will be silenced.
data.author: Vincent Van Gogh

data.quote: Service to others is the rent you pay for your room here on earth
data.author: Muhammad Ali

data.quote: One of the hardest decision you'll ever face in life is choosing whether to walk away or try harder.
data.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

data.quote: Don't worry if people don't like you. Most people are struggling to like themselves.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: Note to self: Keep going. You’re doing great. You might not be where you want to be yet, but that’s okay. Just take it one step at a time and keep believing in yourself. And remember: No matter what happens, you can still enjoy your life and be happy.
data.author: Lori Deschene
